interesting: India became the most populous country in the world in 2023.
China has the world’s longest continuous civilization.
The U.S. has the world’s largest economy.
Indonesia is the largest archipelago nation with over 17,000 islands.
Nigeria is the most populous country in Africa.
Brazil is home to about 60% of the Amazon rainforest.
Bangladesh is one of the most densely populated countries in the world.
Russia is the largest country in the world by land area.
